description_for_human: 世界中のクライミング動画、ランキング、ユーザーデータにアクセス。30年以上のクライミング経験に基づく専門的なAPI。
description_for_model: ClimbHero API provides access to climbing videos from YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Vimeo. Features include: video search with category filters (bouldering, lead, alpine, outdoor), trending videos with like increase rates, rankings (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly), multilingual blog posts (ja/en/zh/ko), announcements, and AI-powered blog URL generation. The /api/genspark/blog-url endpoint generates SEO-optimized URLs in 4 languages from Japanese titles. Built on 30+ years of climbing expertise with real-time data from a gym serving 25,000 annual visitors. Supports pagination, search, category filtering, and multilingual content. All responses include detailed video metadata, thumbnails, durations, and engagement metrics.
